content:
In anthropology, the Nacirema are a fascinating study, known for their elaborate body rituals and belief in powerful magic. They are known to visit holy-mouth-men and medicine men for various rituals. These rituals often involve pain and discomfort, but are believed to improve personal health and social relationships. Based on this description, which field of anthropology is primarily concerned with studying the Nacirema?
A. Linguistic Anthropology
B. Archaeology
C. Biological Anthropology
D. Cultural Anthropology
